titles.title: Support Working Parents Act of 2012
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the phasedown of the credit percentage for the dependent care tax credit.
Support Working Parents Act of 2012

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Support Working Parents Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the phaseout of the tax credit for dependent care services for taxpayers whose adjusted gross incomes exceed $15,000.
